Text:
Already downloaded the album from your previous torrent now just the bonus tracks. I can only say Armin did it again. I just love this album. I will surely buy it when it is released in my country. 
Thank you Inspiron for bringing us all this wonderful trance music!

bought the album, now just gotta download the bonus tracks, thx inspiron, if it wasnt for u, i wouldnt of knowen there were bonus tracks :D

Thanks!

But 16.Armin van Buuren - Youtopia                                         3:59

is feat. Adam Young of Owl City

This album filled a musical void in my life that I never really noticed until I listened all the way through.. Its like I've been waiting 20 years for this.. Mirage - Awesome blend of classic and modern elements.. Feels So Good - So smooth its intoxicating.. Virtual Friend - Experimental Dance? Wow.. Love Too Hard - Story of my life..

This is an album you'll gladly buy after hearing..

And the torrent itself is stellar, no clips, bleeps, or breaks...

Go to ASOT 500 on your continent!! Happy Holidays!!

Comptonius
